translation.en: [interviewer] Why do you think it's important to tell your story?
translation.it: Perché pensi sia importante raccontare la tua storia?

translation.en: Well, it's important 'cause my life is on the line,
translation.it: Beh, perché la mia vita è in gioco

translation.en: and I want people to know that I'm not… I'm not crazy,
translation.it: e voglio che la gente sappia che non sono pazzo,

translation.en: and I'm not a murderer and I'm innocent.
translation.it: che non sono un assassino e che sono innocente.

translation.en: -[Anthony] Hello? -[operator] Sheriff's office. Sheriff's office.
translation.it: - Pronto? - Ufficio dello sceriffo.

translation.en: And, what is the emergency?
translation.it: Sì, qual è l'emergenza?

translation.en: [Anthony] I killed my dad.
translation.it: Ho ucciso mio padre.

translation.en: [woman 1] The scariest thing about Anthony is I don't know if he has empathy.
translation.it: La cosa più inquietante di Anthony è che non so se sia in grado di provare empatia.

translation.en: I look at him and I don't see any feelings.
translation.it: Lo guardo e non vedo alcun sentimento.

translation.en: He was definitely shooting to kill, there is no doubt about it.
translation.it: Stava sparando per uccidere, non c'è dubbio.

translation.en: [man 1] I couldn't understand why Anthony would do that.
translation.it: Non riuscivo a capire perché Anthony l'avesse fatto.

translation.en: Such a quiet, well-behaved young man.
translation.it: Un ragazzo così tranquillo e ben educato.

translation.en: The kid got anything he asked for.
translation.it: Gli veniva dato tutto quello che chiedeva.

translation.en: I think he took an opportunity, and he did something about it.
translation.it: Penso che abbia visto un'opportunità e l'abbia colta al volo.

translation.en: [woman 2] I don't feel like he's guilty.
translation.it: Non credo che sia colpevole, ma che sia stato spinto fino a quel punto.

translation.en: I feel like he was pushed to that point, and he was young and he broke.
translation.it: Non credo che sia colpevole, ma che sia stato spinto fino a quel punto. Era giovane ed ha ceduto.

translation.en: His father pleaded with Anthony, "Don't shoot me anymore."
translation.it: Suo padre supplicò Anthony: "Non spararmi più".

translation.en: And Anthony shoots him two more times.
translation.it: E Anthony gli sparò altre due volte.

translation.en: [woman 1] I don't know the truth.
translation.it: Non so la verità.

translation.en: Not absolutely every bit of it.
translation.it: Non tutti i particolari.

translation.en: There is one person on this planet that knows what happened,
translation.it: C'è una persona su questo pianeta che sa cos'è successo

translation.en: and nobody else does.
translation.it: e nessun altro.

translation.en: [operator] 911, where is your emergency?
translation.it: Nove uno uno, dov'è l'emergenza?

translation.en: I just uh… killed my dad.
translation.it: Ho ucciso mio padre.

translation.en: What do I need to tell you?
translation.it: Che cosa devo dirle?

translation.en: So you said you just killed your dad?
translation.it: Hai detto di aver ucciso tuo padre?

translation.en: [Anthony] Yeah.
translation.it: Sì.

translation.en: [operator] Okay, and um… Is he… Is he still alive, or…?
translation.it: Ok, ed è ancora vivo o…?

translation.en: [Anthony] He might be. I don't know. I shot him like three times, I think.
translation.it: Forse. Non lo so. Gli ho sparato tre volte, credo.

translation.en: -[operator] You shot him three times? -[Anthony] I'm not sure.
translation.it: - Tre volte? - Non so quante volte l'ho colpito.

translation.en: There's blood on the floor, so I know he's been shot once. -I shot three times at him. -[operator] Okay…
translation.it: C'è del sangue sul pavimento, quindi l'ho colpito almeno una volta.

translation.en: [Anthony] He's on the ground.
translation.it: È a terra.

translation.en: [operator] All right, and what's your name?
translation.it: Ok e come ti chiami?

translation.en: [Anthony] Anthony Joseph Templet.
translation.it: Anthony Joseph Templet.

translation.en: [woman] I'm an assistant district attorney and I'm the chief of litigation here.
translation.it: Sono capo della sezione controversie e assistente del procuratore distrettuale.

translation.en: The first time that I heard about Anthony Templet,
translation.it: La prima volta che ho sentito parlare di Anthony Templet

translation.en: it came across my phone because we'd get emails all the time when there's… there's a homicide.
translation.it: è stato con un'email sul mio telefono, le riceviamo quando c'è stato un omicidio.

translation.en: I just remember thinking "Oh, that's sad.
translation.it: Ho pensato: "Che tristezza".

translation.en: You know, it's just, any time, you know, a son kills a father
translation.it: Quando un figlio uccide un padre

translation.en: it's something very unusual and it's a sad thing.
translation.it: è qualcosa d'insolito e di molto triste.

translation.en: And listening to the 911 call was disturbing.
translation.it: E ascoltare la chiamata al 911 è stato inquietante.

translation.en: And I thought, "Hm…"
translation.it: E ho pensato:

translation.en: "Gosh. That-- His affect is so flat."
translation.it: "Caspita. Ha un atteggiamento così atono".

translation.en: [Anthony] I hear sirens.
translation.it: Sento le sirene.

translation.en: [operator] You hear the deputies coming? [Anthony] Yeah.
translation.it: - Puoi sentire arrivare gli agenti? - Sì.

translation.en: [man 2] This was the first time I've come to this neighborhood for a major incident.
translation.it: Era la prima volta che venivo in questo quartiere per un reato grave.

translation.en: There's some places that you don't expect to get phone calls or dispatches of that type.
translation.it: Ci sono posti in cui non ti aspetti di ricevere chiamate di quel tipo.

translation.en: And this was… is one of those neighborhoods.
translation.it: E questo era uno di quei quartieri.

translation.en: [operator] He's waiting outside. What color are you waiting in?
translation.it: Sta aspettando fuori. Come sei vestito?

translation.en: [Anthony] I'm outside.
translation.it: Sono qui fuori.

translation.en: I'm in blue gym shorts and a gray shirt.
translation.it: Indosso dei pantaloncini blu e una maglietta grigia.

translation.en: [William] Dispatch told us that the subject said that
translation.it: La centrale ci disse che il soggetto aveva detto

translation.en: the firearm was inside the residence, but you don't take that for granted.
translation.it: che l'arma era dentro la casa, ma non puoi darlo per scontato.

translation.en: You're always going to get out with the precautions that that person is armed.
translation.it: Devi prendere le stesse precauzioni che prenderesti con una persona armata.

translation.en: [operator] Where exactly are you waiting?
translation.it: Dove stai aspettando fuori?

translation.en: [Anthony] By the road, by the mailboxes.
translation.it: Vicino alle cassette della posta.

translation.en: [William] Hands in the air!
translation.it: Mani in alto!

translation.en: He was very compliant.
translation.it: Fu molto condiscendente.

translation.en: He did exactly what he was told to do.
translation.it: Fece tutto quello che gli fu detto.

translation.en: He wasn't crying.
translation.it: Non piangeva.

translation.en: Almost no emotions.
translation.it: Non esibiva quasi alcuna emozione.

translation.en: For the type of dispatch, yeah, that is odd.
translation.it: Per quel tipo di chiamata, sì, è davvero strano.

translation.en: [Anthony] I didn't understand what was going on.
translation.it: Non capivo cosa stesse succedendo.

translation.en: I thought they needed to cuff me for a second, so that they could figure out what was going on
translation.it: Pensavo che dovessero ammanettarmi solo per capire come stavano le cose

translation.en: and then they'd let me go, but it didn't go that way.
translation.it: e poi mi avrebbero lasciato andare, ma non è andata così.

translation.en: [William] We went down the driveway through the carport in the back door,
translation.it: Prendemmo il vialetto per andare alla porta sul retro

translation.en: which led into the kitchen.
translation.it: che portava in cucina.

translation.en: I saw one revolver laying on the kitchen island with the hammer cocked back,
translation.it: Vidi un revolver sull'isola della cucina con il cane all'indietro

translation.en: and the barrel was facing the entryway into the kitchen.
translation.it: e la canna verso l'ingresso della cucina.

translation.en: We made it through the kitchen, making sure that nobody else was in the house.
translation.it: Entrammo assicurandoci che non ci fosse nessun altro.

translation.en: When I get into the master bedroom…
translation.it: Entrando nella camera da letto,

translation.en: …located another firearm,
translation.it: vidi un'altra pistola

translation.en: laying on the bed with the hammer back on it.
translation.it: sul letto con il cane all'indietro.

translation.en: And it was laying next to a cell phone.
translation.it: Ed era accanto a un cellulare.

translation.en: We saw the victim laying there in the hallway.
translation.it: Vedemmo la vittima stesa nel corridoio.

translation.en: He was laying there in a puddle of blood, still breathing.
translation.it: Era in una pozza di sangue e respirava ancora.

translation.en: EMS paramedics arrived on the scene.
translation.it: I paramedici arrivarono sul posto.

translation.en: They immediately move the victim out of the bathroom area.
translation.it: Spostarono la vittima fuori dall'area del bagno.

translation.en: And they loaded him up and left to the hospital.
translation.it: Lo presero e lo portarono in ospedale.

translation.en: Have a seat right there for me, please.
translation.it: Siediti lì, per favore.

translation.en: [Anthony] I didn't know how the system worked.
translation.it: Non sapevo come funzionasse.

translation.en: So I figured, "Okay… I'm gonna have to spend a little bit--" "A couple days in jail."
translation.it: Così pensai: "Dovrò passare qualche giorno in prigione".

translation.en: But they took me down to, like, a holding cell, and started interrogating me.
translation.it: Ma mi portarono in una camera di sicurezza e iniziarono a interrogarmi.

translation.en: When Anthony first arrived at the Violent Crime unit,
translation.it: Quando Anthony arrivò alla squadra crimini violenti,

translation.en: he was really calm, he was quiet.
translation.it: era molto calmo, era taciturno.

translation.en: And I informed him that I was the investigator, here to talk to him.
translation.it: Gli dissi che ero l'investigatore e che dovevo parlargli.

translation.en: Asked him would he feel like talking about what happened?
translation.it: E gli chiesi se voleva parlare dell'accaduto.

translation.en: He said, "Yes."
translation.it: Disse: "Sì".

translation.en: Let's start off by um… talking about who live at your house.
translation.it: Iniziamo con il parlare di chi vive a casa tua.

translation.en: Okay, so there's just me and my dad that live there.
translation.it: Ok, ci viviamo solo io e mio padre.

translation.en: And explain y'all's relationship.
translation.it: E parlami del vostro rapporto.

translation.en: Well, it's very off and on. We've… We have trouble getting along. And um…
translation.it: Ci sono molti alti e bassi. Facciamo fatica ad andare d'accordo. E…

translation.en: Yeah, I don't really like him.
translation.it: sì, insomma, lui non mi piace molto.

translation.en: -You don't? -No.
translation.it: - Non ti piace? - No.

translation.en: Could you tell me why?
translation.it: Potresti dirmi perché?

translation.en: Well, I don't know. He just holds things over your head.
translation.it: Beh, non lo so. Mi rinfaccia sempre ogni cosa.

translation.en: [Greg] He said his father would insult him,
translation.it: Disse che suo padre lo insultava,

translation.en: call him bad names like a dickhead, or an asshole.
translation.it: lo chiamava cose come testa di cazzo o stronzo.

translation.en: But that was nothing
translation.it: Ma non era nulla

translation.en: that would supersede the homicide of his father.
translation.it: che potesse giustificare l'omicidio di suo padre.

translation.en: [Greg] Let's talk about yesterday.
translation.it: Parliamo di ieri.

translation.en: It was pretty normal. Had dinner. It was all good.
translation.it: Era un giorno normale. Abbiamo cenato. Era tutto ok.

translation.en: And I went to sleep.
translation.it: E sono andato a dormire.

translation.en: And he started looking through my phone in the middle of the night,
translation.it: E nel cuore della notte ha iniziato a guardare il mio telefono.

translation.en: and I was like, you know, "Why are you looking through my phone?"
translation.it: Gli ho chiesto: "Perché guardi il mio telefono?"

translation.en: So, like, "What the heck?" And we got into a big argument.
translation.it: Tipo: "Ma che diamine?" E abbiamo iniziato a discutere.

translation.en: He was accusing me of calling-- Having calls with uh… my stepmother.
translation.it: Mi accusava di aver parlato al telefono con la mia matrigna.

translation.en: [Greg] Well, why wouldn't he want you to even talk to your stepmom?
translation.it: Perché non voleva che parlassi con la tua matrigna?

translation.en: Oh, he's in a… I guess they're in a fight or something.
translation.it: Immagino che abbiano litigato o roba del genere.

translation.en: And he doesn't like secrets.
translation.it: E a lui non piacciono i segreti.

translation.en: [Anthony] Susan and Burt had separated for six months before.
translation.it: Susan e Burt si erano separati sei mesi prima.

translation.en: I was left alone in the house with him.
translation.it: Io sono rimasto solo in casa con lui.

translation.en: He wanted to talk to her really bad, and I guess he just didn't want to feel left out, I guess.
translation.it: Desiderava molto parlare con lei e penso non volesse sentirsi escluso.

translation.en: He couldn't find nothing on my phone.
translation.it: Non ha trovato niente sul telefono.

translation.en: And then he started just yelling and going off about random stuff.
translation.it: E poi ha iniziato a urlare e ad arrabbiarsi di cose a caso.

translation.en: Things went from verbal to physical.
translation.it: Le cose sono passate dal verbale al fisico.

translation.en: Anthony said that Burt was trying to punch him and grab him.
translation.it: Anthony ha detto che Burt ha cercato di dargli un pugno e di afferrarlo.

translation.en: But Anthony pushed him to the side,
translation.it: Ma Anthony lo ha respinto

translation.en: and managed to run out of his room into Burt's room.
translation.it: ed è riuscito a scappare dalla sua stanza e a entrare in quella di Burt.

translation.en: [Anthony] I locked the door on him. And he started banging down the door.
translation.it: Ho chiuso la porta a chiave e lui ha iniziato a colpire la porta.

translation.en: I was scared. I was just scared I was going to get hurt.
translation.it: Avevo paura che mi avrebbe fatto del male.

translation.en: I didn't really know what to think.
translation.it: Non sapevo cosa pensare.

translation.en: I'd figured I'd just get some guns to defend myself.
translation.it: Così ho preso delle pistole per difendermi.

translation.en: [Greg] You say, "guns" or "a gun"?
translation.it: Hai detto "pistole" o "una pistola"?

translation.en: Oh, I grabbed two.
translation.it: Ne ho prese due.

translation.en: One-- I grabbed two in case one didn't work,
translation.it: Nel caso una non avesse funzionato,

translation.en: because I'd never shot these guns in so long.
translation.it: perché non sparavano da tanto tempo.

translation.en: When somebody tell you they have a backup firearms,
translation.it: Quando qualcuno ti dice che ha un'arma di riserva,

translation.en: they basically at the point that they intend to kill you.
translation.it: è in pratica arrivato al punto che intende ucciderti.

translation.en: He had told me about past experiences with him using the firearm,
translation.it: Mi ha detto che quando aveva usato la pistola in passato,

translation.en: how it was easy to pull the trigger with the hammer pulled back.
translation.it: era stato più facile premere il grilletto con il cane tirato indietro.

translation.en: Did you warn him? Did you say anything?
translation.it: L'hai avvertito? Gli hai detto qualcosa?

translation.en: "Hey." Did you tell him to stop?
translation.it: "Ehi." Gli hai detto di smetterla?

translation.en: Did you say, "Hey, Dad, I got a gun"?
translation.it: Gli hai detto: "Papà, ho una pistola"?

translation.en: No-- Oh, he did accuse me. He was like, "You going to shoot me, motherfucker?"
translation.it: No… Oh, mi ha accusato, mi ha detto: "Ehi, vuoi spararmi, figlio di puttana?"

translation.en: or something, through the door, and I was like…
translation.it: O roba del genere, da dietro la porta.

translation.en: And what did you say? Nothing.
translation.it: - E tu che hai detto? - Niente.

translation.en: I just kept going-- I just kept getting the guns.
translation.it: Ho continuato a prendere le pistole.

translation.en: I felt like this was the worst I've ever seen him,
translation.it: Era nello stato peggiore in cui l'avessi mai visto

translation.en: and I didn't see any other way
translation.it: e non vedevo altro modo

translation.en: that this was going to get resolved.
translation.it: per risolvere la situazione.

translation.en: And I felt like my life was really in danger.
translation.it: E sentivo che la mia vita era davvero in pericolo.

translation.en: [Greg] Burt apparently was trying to force his way in the room.
translation.it: Burt cercava di entrare con la forza nella stanza.

translation.en: There was evidence of that from the crack on the door.
translation.it: C'era la prova di questo dalla crepa sulla porta.

translation.en: He ended up stunning himself,
translation.it: Ha finito per stordirsi da solo,

translation.en: and I guess he, like, hit it wrong or something.
translation.it: forse colpendola nel modo sbagliato.

translation.en: Heard a big grunt, or something like that.
translation.it: Ho sentito un grugnito o roba del genere.

translation.en: He stopped banging on the door, and…
translation.it: Ha smesso di colpire la porta,

translation.en: I opened the door…
translation.it: io l'ho aperta…

translation.en: I ended up shooting him.
translation.it: e gli ho sparato.

translation.en: In your dad's room, is there another door
translation.it: Nella stanza di tuo padre c'è un'altra porta

translation.en: to get to another part of the house?
translation.it: da cui si può uscire?

translation.en: Or is there a window, which you could climb out of?
translation.it: O c'è una finestra da cui ci si può calare?

translation.en: There's a couple of windows, probably locked.
translation.it: C'erano un paio di finestre chiuse.

translation.en: But I guess I could've opened them and got out.
translation.it: Ma forse avrei potuto aprirle e uscire.

translation.en: -[Greg] Is there a phone in there? -Yeah, there is.
translation.it: - C'è un telefono lì dentro? - Sì, c'è.

translation.en: -[Greg] In the room? -There is.
translation.it: - Nella stanza? - Sì.

translation.en: [Greg] Anthony had other avenues he could have taken,
translation.it: Anthony avrebbe potuto scegliere altre vie d'uscita,

translation.en: but Anthony clearly stated he wanted to end everything.
translation.it: ma dichiarò chiaramente di aver voluto porre fine a tutto.

translation.en: [interviewer] Was there a choice when you opened that door?
translation.it: Avevi una scelta quando hai aperto la porta?

translation.en: I felt like I didn't.
translation.it: A me sembrava di no.

translation.en: [interviewer] How did you feel after it happened?
translation.it: E come ti sei sentito dopo l'accaduto?

translation.en: I mean, I felt terrible, but, you know, I didn't see any other way.
translation.it: Mi sono sentito malissimo, ma pensavo di non avere avuto scelta.

translation.en: [Greg] I don't believe that Anthony was is any danger.
translation.it: Non credo che Anthony fosse in pericolo.

translation.en: Anthony stated that Burt tried to physically attack him.
translation.it: Anthony ha detto che Burt ha cercato di aggredirlo fisicamente.

translation.en: I did not see any bruising or injuries to Anthony
translation.it: Non ho visto lividi o ferite su Anthony

translation.en: indicative of being involved in a fistic altercation.
translation.it: che indicassero il coinvolgimento in un alterco violento.

translation.en: Your scene'll tell you a lot of things about an incident.
translation.it: La scena ti dirà molte cose su un reato.

translation.en: You talk about a fight or anything like that,
translation.it: Se c'è stata una lotta o roba del genere,

translation.en: you could see overturned furniture, items that have fell to the floor.
translation.it: vedrai mobili rovesciati, oggetti che sono caduti a terra.

translation.en: The home was very, very clean.
translation.it: La casa era pulitissima.

translation.en: Nothing was out of order.
translation.it: Niente era fuori posto.

translation.en: There wasn't even a dish in the sink.
translation.it: Non c'era neanche un piatto nel lavandino.

translation.en: Based on information learned, Anthony's statements, and evidence at the scene,
translation.it: In base alle informazioni apprese, alle affermazioni di Anthony e alle prove,

translation.en: there was probable cause to arrest Anthony.
translation.it: c'erano fondati indizi per l'arresto.

translation.en: He was booked for attempted manslaughter.
translation.it: Fu accusato di tentato omicidio colposo.

translation.en: I woke up to a homicide call on June third
translation.it: Il 3 giugno, la omicidi mi chiamò e disse

translation.en: that my husband was in trauma neurocritical care at Our Lady of the Lake.
translation.it: che mio marito era in terapia intensiva presso l'ospedale Our Lady of the Lake.

translation.en: I went up to the hospital. He's on a ventilator.
translation.it: Mi recai lì. Lui era attaccato a un respiratore.

translation.en: Machines out of every hole.
translation.it: Macchine che gli uscivano da ogni buco.

translation.en: I held his lifeless hand,
translation.it: Ho stretto la sua mano senza vita e gli ho detto che mi dispiaceva tanto.

translation.en: and I told him I was so sorry, that I loved him.
translation.it: Ho stretto la sua mano senza vita e gli ho detto che mi dispiaceva tanto. Che lo amavo. Malgrado tutto, lo amavo.

translation.en: No matter what, I loved him.
translation.it: Che lo amavo. Malgrado tutto, lo amavo.

translation.en: He was four days in the hospital.
translation.it: Rimase quattro giorni in ospedale.

translation.en: And I turned the ventilator off on June 6th,
translation.it: Ho fatto spegnere il respiratore il 6 giugno

translation.en: and he died.
translation.it: e poi è morto.

translation.en: [emotionally] At the hands of his own son.
translation.it: Per mano di suo figlio.

translation.en: [Greg] On June 6, 2019, the East Baton Rouge parish coroner's office contacted me,
translation.it: Il 6 giugno 2019, mi contattò il coroner del distretto di East Baton Rouge

translation.en: informed me that Burt Templet succumbed to his injuries.
translation.it: e disse che Burt Templet era deceduto.

translation.en: The fatal wound was the gunshot wound to his head.
translation.it: La ferita mortale fu quella inflitta alla testa.

translation.en: They removed fragments from his head, and a projectile from his chest.
translation.it: Gli rimossero dei frammenti dalla testa e un proiettile dal petto.

translation.en: The pathologist ruled that Burt's death was a homicide.
translation.it: Il patologo stabilì che la morte di Burt fu un omicidio.

translation.en: Therefore, I upgraded the charges to manslaughter.
translation.it: Quindi, riformulai l'accusa a omicidio colposo.

translation.en: [reporter] Investigators upgraded the charges against this Baton Rouge teen. He is accused of shooting his father, Burt Templet.
translation.it: Un ragazzo di Baton Rouge ha sparato a suo padre, Burt Templet,

translation.en: Now, we're told that the father has died from his injuries.
translation.it: il quale è deceduto per le ferite riportate.

translation.en: That means 17-year-old Anthony Templet will now face manslaughter charges.
translation.it: Quindi, il 17enne Anthony Templet sarà accusato di omicidio colposo.

translation.en: Neighbors we spoke with today say that teen's father, Burt Templet, was not well known in the neighborhood.
translation.it: I vicini dicono che Burt Templet non era molto conosciuto nel quartiere

translation.en: None of the neighbors wanted to go on camera, but those that we spoke with said hardly anyone actually spent time
translation.it: e non hanno voluto farsi riprendere, aggiungendo che nessuno passava del tempo

translation.en: or regularly talked with Templet.
translation.it: o parlava spesso con Templet.

translation.en: When this story fell into my lap, we had the basic information on it,
translation.it: All'inizio della storia, avevamo le informazioni di base,

translation.en: but we of course wanted to know why.
translation.it: ma ovviamente volevamo sapere il perché

translation.en: And that was kind of my task at hand,
translation.it: e il mio compito era cercare di capire cosa fosse successo,

translation.en: to try and figure out, to put on the news that night, was what happened.
translation.it: e il mio compito era cercare di capire cosa fosse successo, per metterlo nel notiziario di quella sera.

translation.en: My first involvement in this story was knocking on doors in the neighborhood,
translation.it: Ho cominciato con il bussare alle porte del quartiere,

translation.en: trying to just get the most basic information
translation.it: cercando di ottenere informazioni

translation.en: of who these people were.
translation.it: su chi fossero queste persone.

translation.en: It's not a large neighborhood. People know each other. Neighbors talk to each other.
translation.it: Il quartiere non è grande. La gente si conosce e parla tra loro.

translation.en: It's people that you'd have over to watch the game, or have over for dinner or…
translation.it: Sono le persone che inviti a guardare la partita o a cena,

translation.en: It's just your good Southern American families.
translation.it: le classiche buone famiglie degli Stati Uniti meridionali.

translation.en: They were shaken a bit that this crime had happened right next door to them,
translation.it: Erano scossi dal fatto che questo crimine fosse avvenuto accanto a loro,

translation.en: in a neighborhood that never had anything go on in it, besides maybe a cookout, right?
translation.it: in un quartiere in cui non accadeva nulla, a parte forse un grande pasto all'aperto.

translation.en: They said that Burt was kind of that strange figure,
translation.it: Dicevano che Burt era una persona strana.

translation.en: if they saw him, would appear drunk.
translation.it: Quando lo vedevano, sembrava ubriaco.

translation.en: [neighbor 1] The thing that bothered me about Burt is he would really boast about
translation.it: Mi infastidiva molto che Burt si vantava… DEPOSIZIONE

translation.en: getting drunk and partying.
translation.it: …di ubriacarsi e fare festa.

translation.en: [neighbor 2] He was definitely odd. He was definitely off.
translation.it: Era decisamente strano, fuori di testa.

translation.en: I got a phone call from somebody on Gray Moss.
translation.it: Un vicino che abitava su Gray Moss Avenue

translation.en: And they said that Burt had come over there and knocked on the door,
translation.it: mi chiamò e disse che Burt, un giorno, era andato lì

translation.en: and was threatening with his wife.
translation.it: e aveva minacciato sua moglie.

translation.en: And the husband said, "He was drunk, he'd been drinking,
translation.it: Il marito mi disse: "Era ubriaco, aveva bevuto,

translation.en: and we told him to stay away from our house and from our property."
translation.it: quindi gli dicemmo di stare lontano da casa nostra".

translation.en: [Austin] No one knew too much about him. No one knew anything about Anthony.
translation.it: Nessuno sapeva molto di lui. Nessuno sapeva niente di Anthony.

translation.en: They couldn't even probably tell you his age.
translation.it: Non sapevano neanche la sua età.

translation.en: [neighbor 1] I ran into him when I was at Costco. And this was the first time I'd ever met Anthony.
translation.it: Incontrai Anthony a Costco e fu la prima volta che lo conobbi.

translation.en: Anthony was just very withdrawn, you know.
translation.it: Anthony era davvero molto riservato.

translation.en: [neighbor 2] When I was at their house, I didn't see him. Anytime I drove by their house, I didn't see them.
translation.it: Quando fui a casa loro, non lo vidi. Passando lì davanti, non li vedevo.

translation.en: -[investigator] Visually, you never even… -[neighbor 2] No.
translation.it: Neanche di sfuggita, voi… No.

translation.en: [investigator] …met or saw--?
translation.it: …li vedevate?

translation.en: -[neighbor 1] Never. -[neighbor 2] No.
translation.it: - No, mai. - No.

translation.en: [Anthony] I didn't talk to anybody for like maybe a week or two.
translation.it: Non parlai con nessuno per una settimana o due.

translation.en: It was a scary time because I didn't know where I was going, what I was going to do, or… anything.
translation.it: Fu un periodo spaventoso, non sapevo dove stavo andando o cosa avrei fatto.

translation.en: [operator] This is a collect call from…
translation.it: Chiamata a carico da…

translation.en: [Anthony] …Anthony Templet.
translation.it: Anthony Templet.

translation.en: [man] Hey, are you there?
translation.it: Ehi, ci sei?

translation.en: -[Anthony] Yeah. -[man] Hear me?
translation.it: - Sì. - Puoi sentirmi?

translation.en: [Anthony] Calls are recorded, Got to watch what I say. [man] I know how this works.
translation.it: - Ci registrano. Devo stare attento. - Lo so. So come funziona.

translation.en: [Anthony] My bond has been set to 100,000 now, from 50,000.
translation.it: La mia cauzione è stata fissata a 100.000, da 50.000.

translation.en: [man] Well, I knew it was gonna go up.
translation.it: Sapevo che sarebbe aumentata.

translation.en: [Anthony] Yeah.
translation.it: Già.

translation.en: He called me. And I had a lot of questions about how the hell it happened.
translation.it: Mi chiamò. Avevo molte domande su come diavolo fosse successo.

translation.en: Nobody indicated to me that there was ever any problems between Burt and Anthony.
translation.it: Nessuno mi aveva mai detto che Burt e Anthony avessero dei problemi.

translation.en: He paid for everything for Anthony.
translation.it: Lui pagava tutto per Anthony.

translation.en: In my eyes, he treated him like a king.
translation.it: Ai miei occhi, lo trattava come un re.

translation.en: [Susan] When I first met Burt,
translation.it: Ho conosciuto Burt in un Bar Sport il giorno del mio compleanno.

translation.en: I was at a little sports bar watching the LSU game on my birthday.
translation.it: Ho conosciuto Burt in un Bar Sport il giorno del mio compleanno. Guardavo la partita della LSU.

translation.en: Me and my first husband had fallen out,
translation.it: Mi ero lasciata col mio primo marito

translation.en: and a friend introduced us.
translation.it: e un'amica in comune ci presentò.

translation.en: We both loved to drink some beer, spend the day in the pool, barbecue.
translation.it: Entrambi amavamo la birra, le grigliate, passare la giornata in piscina.

translation.en: Eventually, I was living with Burt and Anthony, and my son Peyton.
translation.it: In seguito, sono andata a vivere con Burt, Anthony e mio figlio Peyton.

translation.en: Anthony was seven.
translation.it: Anthony aveva sette anni.

translation.en: He had a funny personality. He was laugh-y, not a care in the world,
translation.it: Aveva una personalità divertente, rideva, non aveva preoccupazioni,

translation.en: making funny faces, somewhat sarcastic,
translation.it: faceva facce buffe, era un po' sarcastico,

translation.en: non-caring, nonchalant.
translation.it: noncurante, disinvolto.

translation.en: We would do things in the kitchen together,
translation.it: Facevamo delle cose insieme in cucina

translation.en: and it was like you gave him a million dollars.
translation.it: e lo rendeva felice come una Pasqua,

translation.en: 'Cause somebody was doing something with him,
translation.it: perché qualcuno stava facendo qualcosa con lui

translation.en: and not critiquing how he did everything.
translation.it: senza criticarlo in ogni piccola cosa.

translation.en: Whenever Burt came into our lives,
translation.it: Ogni volta che c'era Burt,

translation.en: our relationship was more conservative.
translation.it: il nostro rapporto era più conservatore.

translation.en: For an example, we didn't joke as openly.
translation.it: Per esempio, non scherzavamo così apertamente.

translation.en: And that is why
translation.it: Per questo motivo

translation.en: AJ did not like to come out of his room, because then he had to deal with his father.
translation.it: ad AJ non piaceva uscire dalla sua stanza, perché poi doveva confrontarsi col padre.

translation.en: When he was around his dad, he couldn't be himself.
translation.it: Vicino a suo padre, non poteva essere sé stesso.

translation.en: He wasn't comfortable enough, he was too scared.
translation.it: Non era a suo agio, era troppo spaventato.

translation.en: He always kinda found a way to make me feel like I was doing something wrong.
translation.it: Trovava sempre un modo per farmi sentire che stavo sbagliando.

translation.en: It made me real-- feel really sad, and I didn't…
translation.it: Mi faceva sentire molto triste e ci stavo tanto male e mi sentivo in colpa.

translation.en: I felt really bad and guilty.
translation.it: e ci stavo tanto male e mi sentivo in colpa.

translation.en: [Peyton] Burt, in his own strange way, loved his son.
translation.it: Burt, a modo suo, per quanto strano, amava suo figlio.

translation.en: However, AJ despised Burt.
translation.it: Tuttavia, AJ odiava Burt.

translation.en: [Susan] As he evolved, he became really quiet.
translation.it: Crescendo, diventò molto taciturno.

translation.en: He was mostly to himself.
translation.it: Stava per lo più da solo.

translation.en: [Michael] Susan'd tell me that she was scared of Anthony.
translation.it: Susan mi diceva che aveva paura di Anthony.

translation.en: She didn't know if he would shoot her,
translation.it: Non sapeva se le avrebbe sparato,

translation.en: if he'd kill her, if he'd hurt her.
translation.it: se l'avrebbe uccisa o fatto del male.

translation.en: She was afraid of him.
translation.it: Aveva paura di lui.

translation.en: Anthony has no emotion.
translation.it: Anthony non ha emozioni.

translation.en: And you can never tell whether he's angry or happy.
translation.it: E non si capisce mai se è arrabbiato o felice.

translation.en: You can never tell anything. It's just a flatline.
translation.it: Non si capisce. È come una linea piatta.

translation.en: I don't know if he has empathy.
translation.it: Non so se è in grado di provare empatia.

translation.en: When I watched the interview the first time, I was like,
translation.it: Quando ho visto il suo interrogatorio, ho pensato:

translation.en: "Oh, my gosh,
translation.it: "Mio Dio,

translation.en: there's not a tear shed for his father."
translation.it: non ha versato una lacrima per suo padre".

translation.en: I shot him once or twice-- It was two times more.
translation.it: Gli ho sparato una o due volte. Erano più di due volte.

translation.en: At least I shot the gun three times, but I don't know how many times I hit him.
translation.it: Ho sparato tre volte, ma non so quante volte l'ho colpito.

translation.en: I was just kind of like… you know?
translation.it: Ho fatto, tipo, così… Ha presente?

translation.en: Having been in this system for 44 years,
translation.it: Lavoro nella procura da 44 anni

translation.en: you normally see folks that are crying.
translation.it: e di solito vedo la gente piangere,

translation.en: You're upset, you're angry.
translation.it: sconvolta, arrabbiata.

translation.en: "Why did he make me do it? This was going on. This is why I did what I did."
translation.it: "Perché me l'ha fatto fare? È successo così. L'ho fatto per quello".

translation.en: Just wasn't there, it was flat.
translation.it: Non c'era nulla di tutto ciò. Era atono.

translation.en: My dad just made me, you know, kind of stop caring about…
translation.it: Mio padre mi ha fatto smettere di preoccuparmi…

translation.en: about my feelings, and just started to kinda,
translation.it: dei miei sentimenti e quindi, ho iniziato

translation.en: I guess, let go of them, I guess.
translation.it: a lasciarli andare.

translation.en: I probably felt love for my dad in my younger years, but as I got older,
translation.it: Forse da giovane volevo bene a mio padre, ma crescendo,

translation.en: it started to go away.
translation.it: ha iniziato a svanire.

translation.en: I just try to have no feelings. I just try not-- I just try to pretend it never even happened,
translation.it: Cerco di non provare alcun sentimento. Provo a far finta che non sia successo.

translation.en: and that helps me move on, so…
translation.it: E questo mi aiuta ad andare avanti, quindi…

translation.en: [interviewer] Do you want to live having no feelings? Do you want to have feelings?
translation.it: Vuoi continuare a vivere così o vuoi provare di nuovo qualcosa?

translation.en: I can have feelings for people. I just choose not to for him.
translation.it: Posso provare dei sentimenti. Ma non voglio provarne per lui.

translation.en: There was one thing, kind of struck me as, "Wow, that's very weird."
translation.it: Una cosa mi colpì molto e dissi: "Caspita, è davvero strano".

translation.en: -[Greg] Anthony, how old are you? -Seventeen.
translation.it: - Quanti anni hai? - Diciassette.

translation.en: -[Greg] You're 17? -Yeah.
translation.it: - Hai 17 anni? - Sì.

translation.en: [Greg] And your date of birth is what?
translation.it: E qual è la tua data di nascita?

translation.en: It's either September 13th, 2001, or two. I can't remember which one.
translation.it: È il 13 settembre 2001 o 2002. Non ricordo bene quale.

translation.en: [Greg coughs] And what's your current address?
translation.it: E qual è il tuo indirizzo?

translation.en: -My home address? -[Greg] Yes, sir.
translation.it: - L'indirizzo di casa? - Sì.

translation.en: One-seven… 652 Gray Moss Avenue, I think.
translation.it: Vivo al numero 652 di Gray Moss Avenue, credo.

translation.en: Again, can't really remember.
translation.it: Di nuovo, non ricordo bene.

translation.en: [Dana] He doesn't know his own birth date. He doesn't know his address.
translation.it: Non sapeva la sua data di nascita. Non sapeva il suo indirizzo di casa.

translation.en: Who doesn't know their address?
translation.it: Come si fa a non saperlo?

translation.en: I had more questions after the interview than I had answers.
translation.it: Dopo l'interrogatorio avevo più domande che risposte.

translation.en: [man] When people find out that I'm in Louisiana,
translation.it: Quando la gente scopre

translation.en: that I'm an attorney here, a criminal defense attorney… [laughs]
translation.it: che sono un avvocato penalista in Louisiana

translation.en: …I get, "Man, you're always gonna be in business." [chuckles]
translation.it: dice: "Non ti mancherà mai il lavoro".

translation.en: I mean, there are shootings and murders every week in Baton Rouge.
translation.it: Ci sono sparatorie e omicidi ogni settimana a Baton Rouge.

translation.en: Like clockwork. We have the highest incarceration rate in the country.
translation.it: Regolarmente. Il tasso d'incarcerazione è il più alto del Paese.

translation.en: Is that a product of the criminal justice system?
translation.it: È un prodotto del sistema giudiziario?

translation.en: Or is that a product of the fact that the people of Louisiana are a little crazy?
translation.it: O forse la gente della Louisiana è un po' pazza?

translation.en: Frankly, I have a history of drinking like a crazy person, and I have been in a hundred bar fights.
translation.it: In passato ho bevuto come un pazzo e ho partecipato a centinaia di risse.

translation.en: Louisianians are survivors.
translation.it: Qui in Louisiana, siamo dei sopravvissuti.

translation.en: And I think that that's part my personality,
translation.it: Fa parte della mia personalità,

translation.en: but it's also part of what's ingrained in me about being a Louisiana boy.
translation.it: ma è anche radicato in me essendo un ragazzo della Louisiana.

translation.en: I know how to survive.
translation.it: So sopravvivere.

translation.en: I embrace that part of me that is kind of crazy, that is a little out of the box.
translation.it: Apprezzo quella parte di me un po' folle, un po' fuori dagli schemi.

translation.en: And I can see in my clients that there are good people who made serious mistakes.
translation.it: E in alcuni dei miei clienti vedo delle brave persone che hanno fatto gravi errori.

translation.en: I heard the public story about Anthony's case, what's in the newspaper.
translation.it: Sul caso di Anthony, sapevo solo quello che c'era sui giornali.

translation.en: But that's it. That's all I've got.
translation.it: Tutto qui. No avevo altro.

translation.en: And someone else hooked me up with Susan,
translation.it: Poi mi hanno messo in contatto con Susan,

translation.en: Anthony's stepmom.
translation.it: la matrigna di Anthony.

translation.en: And I spoke to her and I said, "Look, this is who I am, I'm exceedingly good at this."
translation.it: E le ho detto: "Questo è quello che sono, e sono bravissimo nel mio lavoro".

translation.en: And I wanted to talk to Anthony. You know, "Is this true?" "Was this really self-defense?"
translation.it: E volevo parlare con Anthony. Chiedergli: "È stata davvero autodifesa?"

translation.en: Is this what really happened, or is this some made-up story,
translation.it: È andata così o è una storia inventata e ha ucciso suo padre a sangue freddo?

translation.en: and he killed his dad in cold blood one night?
translation.it: o è una storia inventata e ha ucciso suo padre a sangue freddo?

translation.en: I really don't know what's happening, right?
translation.it: Non lo sapevo davvero, giusto?

translation.en: So I went to the jail to talk to Anthony.
translation.it: Così sono andato in prigione a parlare con Anthony.

translation.en: -[Jarrett] How you doing? -[Anthony] I'm doing pretty good.
translation.it: - Come stai? - Sto abbastanza bene, sì.

translation.en: [Jarrett] You okay? Okay.
translation.it: Stai bene? Ok.

translation.en: So essentially, AJ-- Can I call you AJ?
translation.it: In pratica, AJ… Posso chiamarti AJ?

translation.en: [Anthony] AJ or Anthony, whichever you prefer.
translation.it: AJ o Anthony, come preferisce.

translation.en: -[Jarrett] What do you prefer? -[Anthony] Anthony.
translation.it: Tu quale preferisci? - Anthony, immagino. - Ok.

translation.en: [Jarrett] Okay.
translation.it: - Anthony, immagino. - Ok.

translation.en: It was unbelievably difficult.
translation.it: Fu incredibilmente difficile.

translation.en: It was hard to get him to share anything or talk at all.
translation.it: Fu dura convincerlo a parlare.

translation.en: At that time, he was really, really bad at communicating his own life,
translation.it: Allora, non era affatto bravo a parlare della sua vita,

translation.en: or the instance, or whatever.
translation.it: del caso, di tutto.

translation.en: It was important to us to know what actually was going on in the house.
translation.it: Per noi era importante sapere cosa succedeva in casa.

translation.en: So we sent our investigators out
translation.it: Così mandammo i nostri investigatori

translation.en: to talk to people that were close or related to Burt Templet.
translation.it: a parlare con persone vicine o imparentate con Burt Templet.

translation.en: I wanted to talk to his best friend. A best friend, usually you can get kind of like a little bit more information.
translation.it: Volevo parlare con il suo migliore amico, per ricevere qualche informazione in più.

translation.en: [friend] I was probably about 15 or 16 when I first met Burt.
translation.it: Avevo 15 o 16 anni quando ho conosciuto Burt.

translation.en: He was a good friend.
translation.it: Era un buon amico.

translation.en: He knew everything.
translation.it: Sapeva tutto.

translation.en: And he always, of course, tried to be the man of the crowd.
translation.it: E voleva sempre essere al centro dell'attenzione.

translation.en: He told me he worked in plants at times.
translation.it: Diceva che a volte lavorava nelle fabbriche.

translation.en: Uh… I really wasn't very clear about what exactly he did.
translation.it: Non mi era molto chiaro cosa facesse.

translation.en: He said he made a lot of money, supposedly.
translation.it: Ma diceva che faceva un sacco di soldi.

translation.en: He had a lot of nice things, a nice house.
translation.it: Aveva molte belle cose, una bella casa.

translation.en: [Susan] He was a project controls engineer that made $100 an hour.
translation.it: Era un ingegnere di controllo dei progetti e guadagnava $100 all'ora.

translation.en: [quavers] He was an excellent provider.
translation.it: Non ci faceva mancare niente.

translation.en: We had new cars. We had…
translation.it: Avevamo auto nuove. Avevamo…

translation.en: …a beautiful home.
translation.it: una bellissima casa.

translation.en: We bought a swimming pool. We put it up together. [sniffles]
translation.it: Comprammo una piscina e la montammo insieme.

translation.en: We would go on trips out the wazoo.
translation.it: Facevamo viaggi a bizzeffe.

translation.en: [James] On the weekends, we'd hang out, and swim and barbecue,
translation.it: Nei weekend, stavamo insieme, nuotavamo, facevamo il barbecue,

translation.en: and high-fiving, hugging, telling each other, "I love you, my brother."
translation.it: ci davamo il cinque, ci abbracciavamo, ci dicevamo: "Ti voglio bene, fra'".

translation.en: [quavers] You know?
translation.it: Ha presente?

translation.en: AJ was pretty much to himself.
translation.it: AJ se ne stava per conto suo.

translation.en: We hung out in the pool a few times, not much at all.
translation.it: A volte veniva a stare con noi in piscina, ma non molto spesso.

translation.en: Anthony was real quiet.
translation.it: Era molto taciturno.

translation.en: Every time I'd go in the house, he'd be on his laptop, on the computer, he would be in there playing his video games.
translation.it: Quando andavo da loro, lui era lì a giocare ai videogiochi sul portatile.

translation.en: I couldn't understand why Anthony would do that.
translation.it: Non riuscivo a capire perché Anthony l'avesse fatto.

translation.en: Such a quiet and well-behaved young man.
translation.it: Un ragazzo così tranquillo e ben educato.

translation.en: How could he shoot your own father?
translation.it: Come ha potuto sparare a suo padre?

translation.en: Now, they say that you never know what goes behind closed doors.
translation.it: Dicono che non si sa mai cosa succede dietro le porte chiuse.

translation.en: Burt ended up putting cameras up on the house.
translation.it: Burt mise delle telecamere sulla casa.

translation.en: Like all the entrances, driveways…
translation.it: A tutte le entrate, ai vialetti…

translation.en: The entire house is on surveillance cameras, except for the master bedroom.
translation.it: Ci sono telecamere ovunque, tranne che nella la camera da letto.

translation.en: [Michael] There's eight cameras outside. Most people put them up to secure their home.
translation.it: Fuori ci sono otto telecamere. Di solito, si mettono per protezione.

translation.en: [Susan] He wanted to protect us.
translation.it: Voleva proteggerci.

translation.en: Keep the family safe.
translation.it: Tenere la famiglia al sicuro.

translation.en: I love you so much.
translation.it: Ti amo tantissimo.

translation.en: Do I think it's unusual for him to have cameras? No.
translation.it: Penso che sia insolito che le abbia messe? No.

translation.en: Did he have underlying intent?
translation.it: Aveva qualche motivo nascosto?

translation.en: Maybe.
translation.it: Forse.

translation.en: Anything and everything immediately outside of the house, he saw.
translation.it: Vedeva tutto nelle immediate vicinanze della casa.

translation.en: I didn't like it, but I chose to look past it at the time.
translation.it: Non mi piaceva, ma all'epoca scelsi d'ignorarlo.

translation.en: [woman] Creepy.
translation.it: Inquietante.

translation.en: That made me think-- That was very creepy to be checking on your child like that.
translation.it: Era davvero inquietante che controllasse il figlio in quel modo.

translation.en: When I met Anthony, I think he was 16.
translation.it: Quando ho conosciuto Anthony, credo avesse 16 anni.

translation.en: Anthony and I worked shoulder to shoulder, most days.
translation.it: Lavoravamo fianco a fianco, quasi tutti i giorni.

translation.en: I felt a little bit like a mom for him,
translation.it: Mi sentivo un po' come una mamma per lui, perché non sembrava avere

translation.en: only because, you know, he didn't seem to have a mother figure there.
translation.it: Mi sentivo un po' come una mamma per lui, perché non sembrava avere una figura materna.

translation.en: My boss, Scott, lived in the same subdivision as Burt Templet.
translation.it: Il mio capo, Scott, viveva nello stesso quartiere di Burt Templet.

translation.en: On June 3rd, Scott called me before work started
translation.it: Il 3 giugno, Scott mi chiamò prima dell'inizio del lavoro e disse:

translation.en: and said, "Hey, I just got a phone call from some of the neighbors."
translation.it: Il 3 giugno, Scott mi chiamò prima dell'inizio del lavoro e disse: "Dei vicini di Anthony mi hanno detto che ci sono stati degli spari a casa sua".

translation.en: "There was a shooting at Anthony's house."
translation.it: "Dei vicini di Anthony mi hanno detto che ci sono stati degli spari a casa sua".

translation.en: It seemed like, in the news media, it was just a random shooting,
translation.it: Dai media sembrava che avesse sparato senza ragione.

translation.en: this privileged white boy just shooting his dad.
translation.it: Un ricco ragazzo bianco che spara al padre.

translation.en: But I knew there was more with this story.
translation.it: Ma sapevo che c'era dell'altro in quella storia.

translation.en: I just wanted his story to be heard.
translation.it: Volevo che la sua storia fosse ascoltata.

translation.en: Burt knew Scott, and so that's how Anthony had gotten a job at the greenhouse.
translation.it: Anthony aveva trovato lavoro alla serra perché Burt conosceva Scott.

translation.en: [Scott] It started off with his dad repeatedly asking me whether I could give his son a job.
translation.it: Suo padre mi chiese ripetutamente se potevo dare un lavoro a suo figlio.

translation.en: I told Burt, "But I don't know your son."
translation.it: Io gli dissi: "Burt, ma non conosco tuo figlio.

translation.en: "Maybe if we get a chance to meet each other,
translation.it: Forse se ci incontrassimo

translation.en: I can give you an answer."
translation.it: potrei darti una risposta".

translation.en: [Elena] They went out to eat, you know, just to meet Anthony beforehand, to get an idea.
translation.it: Andarono a pranzo insieme, per conoscere Anthony e farsi un'idea.

translation.en: [Scott] And I was trying to get to know Anthony.
translation.it: Volevo conoscere Anthony.

translation.en: I couldn't ask him a question without Burt being the one to answer everything.
translation.it: Ma non potevo fargli una domanda senza che Burt rispondesse a tutto.

translation.en: Burt had-- He wanted to be in control the whole time.
translation.it: Burt voleva essere in controllo per tutto il tempo.

translation.en: So we put him to work.
translation.it: Così gli detti un lavoro.

translation.en: My first impressions of Anthony… Uh… [sighs]
translation.it: Le mie prime impressioni su Anthony

translation.en: He just seemed-- It was like he had never been outside of his house,
translation.it: furono che sembrava come se non fosse mai uscito da casa sua,

translation.en: honestly, is what it seemed like.
translation.it: davvero, è quello che sembrava.

translation.en: He had never heard of, you know, Tom Hanks or Tom Cruise.
translation.it: Non sapeva chi erano Tom Hanks o Tom Cruise.

translation.en: He did something right, I said, "Hey, up top, Anthony! Up top!"
translation.it: Fece una cosa bene e io gli dissi: "Bravo! Mettile qui!"

translation.en: He looked at me like, "What does that mean?" And I was like, "You know, give me a high five!"
translation.it: Mi guardò e mi chiese: "Che significa?" Risposi: "Beh, sai, dammi il cinque!

translation.en: "You know what that is, right?" "No, I don't know what that is."
translation.it: Sai cos'è, vero?" "No, non lo so."

translation.en: I just thought Anthony had been seriously neglected.
translation.it: Pensai che fosse stato davvero trascurato.

translation.en: He didn't ever meet any of his relatives for the holidays.
translation.it: Non si era mai riunito con i suoi parenti per le feste.

translation.en: He didn't know if he had any grandparents.
translation.it: Non sapeva se avesse dei nonni.

translation.en: He didn't know his mom.
translation.it: Non conosceva sua madre.

translation.en: I had asked him, "What is her name?" He didn't know her name.
translation.it: Gli avevo chiesto come si chiamava e non lo sapeva.

translation.en: [Scott] I knew he was homeschooled.
translation.it: Sapevo che aveva studiato a casa.

translation.en: I have employed many homeschooled kids
translation.it: Ho assunto molti ragazzi che lo hanno fatto

translation.en: and often their social abilities are lacking to some degree.
translation.it: e spesso le loro abilità relazionali sono carenti in una certa misura.

translation.en: So I thought maybe that was the biggest part of it.
translation.it: Pensai che quella fosse la ragione principale

translation.en: But the boy just couldn't talk. [chuckles] You know?
translation.it: per la quale il ragazzo non fosse in grado di conversare.

translation.en: [Elena] I would try to engage him in conversation,
translation.it: Cercavo di farlo conversare

translation.en: and ask him, you know, about where he was in school.
translation.it: chiedendogli a che punto fosse con i suoi studi.

translation.en: He never could quite tell me what classes he was in though.
translation.it: Ma non ha mai saputo dirmi a quale grado fosse arrivato.

translation.en: I knew, you know, it wasn't right, but it wasn't enough for me to look into.
translation.it: Sapevo che non era giusto, ma non fino al punto da spingermi a voler indagare.

translation.en: His dad was keeping serious tabs on him with a GPS tracker on his phone.
translation.it: Suo padre lo teneva sotto controllo con un localizzatore GPS sul suo telefono.

translation.en: There was a couple of times when Burt called my boss and said,
translation.it: Un paio di volte, Burt chiamò il capo e disse:

translation.en: "Hey, I noticed on Anthony's GPS tracker he hasn't moved in the last 30 minutes."
translation.it: "Ho notato sul localizzatore di Anthony che non si è mosso negli ultimi 30 minuti.

translation.en: "What's he doing? What's going on?"
translation.it: Che sta facendo? Che succede?"

translation.en: It would be because he was standing there fertilizing like a set group of pots. It was in one location.
translation.it: Ed era perché stava fertilizzando un gruppo di vasi nello stesso posto.

translation.en: That was weird.
translation.it: Era davvero strano.

translation.en: After June 3rd, I went back and I looked at Anthony's application a little more closely
translation.it: Dopo il 3 giugno, ho guardato la domanda di assunzione di Anthony più da vicino

translation.en: and realized that Burt had typed up the application for Anthony.
translation.it: e ho capito che Burt l'aveva scritta per Anthony.

translation.en: I was looking on there to see what it said for education,
translation.it: Volevo vedere cosa diceva per l'istruzione

translation.en: and it said "Kaplan Prep."
translation.it: e c'era scritto "Kaplan Prep."

translation.en: When I went back and researched Kaplan Prep School, it was actually not a prep school.
translation.it: Quando ho fatto ricerche, ho visto che non era un collegio privato.

translation.en: It was a website to order standardized testing materials.
translation.it: Era un sito per ordinare materiale per test standardizzati.

translation.en: So he actually never went to-- Was never homeschooled.
translation.it: Perciò, in realtà, non è mai stato istruito a casa.

translation.en: That's when I kind of thought, "Okay, maybe something is going on."
translation.it: Quindi ho pensato: "Ok, forse sta succedendo qualcosa.

translation.en: "This is not just a random shooting. You know, like maybe there's a reason."
translation.it: Non ha sparato senza ragione. Forse c'è stato un motivo".

translation.en: The question then also was,
translation.it: A quel punto, mi sono chiesta:

translation.en: "Where is Anthony's mom?"
translation.it: "Dov'è la mamma di Anthony?"

translation.en: And that's when I called Shayna Landry.
translation.it: Ed è allora che ho chiamato Shayna Landry.

translation.en: Anthony came into my life
translation.it: Anthony entrò nella mia vita

translation.en: by sheer accident.
translation.it: per puro caso.

translation.en: My husband called me one day and he said,
translation.it: Un giorno, mio marito mi chiamò e disse:

translation.en: "Hey, have you heard anything about this kid in the news that shot his father?"
translation.it: "Ehi, hai sentito parlare al telegiornale del ragazzo che ha sparato a suo padre?"

translation.en: And I said, "Well, it seems pretty cut and dry to me."
translation.it: E io risposi: "Beh, a me sembra piuttosto semplice.

translation.en: "I read the story and it sounds like snobby, rich kid that got mad at his dad and shot him."
translation.it: Un ragazzo ricco e snob si è arrabbiato con il padre e gli ha sparato".

translation.en: He told me that his coworker knew Anthony's manager,
translation.it: Lui mi disse che il suo collega conosceva il manager di Anthony

translation.en: and there was a lot more to the story.
translation.it: e che c'era molto di più.

translation.en: He suggested that Elena call me
translation.it: Suggerì a Elena di chiamarmi

translation.en: because of my background in solving DNA puzzles.
translation.it: per via della mia esperienza nel risolvere enigmi del DNA.

translation.en: I had a little shock a couple of years ago
translation.it: Ebbi un piccolo shock un paio di anni fa e scoprii

translation.en: and found out that the man that I originally thought was my father wasn't.
translation.it: Ebbi un piccolo shock un paio di anni fa e scoprii che l'uomo che pensavo fosse mio padre, non lo era.

translation.en: And I did a DNA test
translation.it: E feci un test del DNA

translation.en: and found out that my father
translation.it: e scoprii che il mio vero padre

translation.en: was someone totally different and he had no idea that I existed.
translation.it: era qualcun altro e non sapeva della mia esistenza.

translation.en: So I continued to help other families find their DNA matches or solve their mysteries.
translation.it: Così iniziai ad aiutare altre famiglie a trovare le corrispondenze del loro DNA.

translation.en: I've located,
translation.it: Ho localizzato,

translation.en: I guess almost 40 fathers
translation.it: credo, quasi 40 padri

translation.en: or other family members that show up in people's DNA.
translation.it: o altri membri della famiglia che compaiono nel DNA delle persone.

translation.en: I called Shayna… [inhales]
translation.it: Chiamai Shayna

translation.en: …and I said, "Okay, someone needs to find his mom."
translation.it: e dissi: "Ok, qualcuno deve trovare sua madre".

translation.en: I was like, "Let me give it a shot."
translation.it: E io risposi: "Fammi fare un tentativo".

translation.en: I wanted to do a DNA test.
translation.it: Volevo fare un test del DNA.

translation.en: The initial jail he was in, though, was very rough,
translation.it: La prigione in cui si trovava, però, era molto dura

translation.en: and they did not allow outside visitors at all.
translation.it: e non permettevano assolutamente visite dall'esterno.

translation.en: But I couldn't let it go.
translation.it: Ma non potevo rinunciare.

translation.en: I was blasting social media,
translation.it: Mandai in tilt i social media

translation.en: trying to find out if anyone knows something about Anthony,
translation.it: cercando di scoprire se qualcuno sapesse qualcosa di Anthony,

translation.en: but I couldn't find anything.
translation.it: ma non riuscii a trovare nulla.

translation.en: Due to Anthony being a minor, I knew that none of his information would show up online.
translation.it: Essendo minorenne, le informazioni di Anthony non sarebbero emerse online.

translation.en: So I started looking at Burt pretty hard.
translation.it: Così iniziai a fare ricerche approfondite su Burt.

translation.en: I found some criminal records.
translation.it: Trovai dei precedenti penali.

translation.en: There were some felonies, some misdemeanors,
translation.it: C'erano dei crimini, alcuni reati minori,

translation.en: but they were all assault charges.
translation.it: ma erano tutte accuse di aggressione.

translation.en: And one of them specifically jumped out to me
translation.it: E una in particolare mi colpì

translation.en: because it said "assault with bodily injury of a family member."
translation.it: perché diceva: "Aggressione con lesioni a un membro della famiglia".

translation.en: And that one was done the same year that Anthony was born.
translation.it: E fu commessa lo stesso anno in cui nacque Anthony.

translation.en: I knew that he was born in Texas.
translation.it: Sapevo che era nato in Texas.

translation.en: I have a private investigator friend who drove to Houston looking for more details.
translation.it: Un mio amico investigatore privato andò a Houston a cercare più dettagli.

translation.en: He was trying to find out if we could figure out who the victim was in the domestic violence cases.
translation.it: Volevamo scoprire chi fosse la vittima nei casi di violenza domestica.

translation.en: [Elena] Shayna starts looking, and I thought, "How long is this gonna take her?"
translation.it: Shayna iniziò a indagare e io pensai: "Quanto tempo le ci vorrà?

translation.en: "Because Anthony is locked up in jail
translation.it: Perché Anthony è in carcere

translation.en: and I don't want him to just kind of get lost in the system."
translation.it: e non voglio che vada perso nel sistema.

translation.en: "So I don't want to tell her to hurry up,
translation.it: Quindi, non voglio dirle di sbrigarsi,

translation.en: but I need her to hurry up," and so… [laughs]
translation.it: ma ho bisogno che si sbrighi".

translation.en: [Shayna] I started using this website that I use to find family members.
translation.it: Iniziai a usare questo sito che uso per trovare i famigliari.

translation.en: It's like a paid version of WhitePages,
translation.it: È una sorta di Pagine Bianche

translation.en: but it gives anyone who maybe got mail at the same home as them
translation.it: che dà come "associato" chi ha ricevuto della posta a casa di una data persona

translation.en: at any given time, as an "associate."
translation.it: in un determinato momento.

translation.en: I wanted to see if I could find any associates from Texas
translation.it: Volevo vedere se riuscivo a trovare degli associati in Texas,

translation.en: since I knew Anthony was born there.
translation.it: visto che Anthony era nato lì.

translation.en: And I found this girl
translation.it: E trovai questa ragazza

translation.en: associated with Burt.
translation.it: associata a Burt.

translation.en: And the way she spells her name, "Netasha," is very unique.
translation.it: E il modo in cui scrive il suo nome, "Netasha", è molto particolare.

translation.en: She has an "e" in the beginning of it instead of an "a."
translation.it: Ha una "e" all'inizio invece di una "a".

translation.en: So it's "N-E-T-A-S-H-A."
translation.it: Quindi è: N-E-T-A-S-H-A.

translation.en: So it wasn't hard to just find her on Facebook.
translation.it: Quindi, non fu difficile trovarla su Facebook.

translation.en: [Elena] She sent me a picture and said, "Do you think this could be his sister?"
translation.it: Mi mandò una foto e disse: "Potrebbe essere sua sorella questa?"

translation.en: And I was like,
translation.it: E io dissi:

translation.en: "Oh, my gosh, that's absolutely his sister."
translation.it: "Oh, mio Dio! È sicuramente sua sorella".

translation.en: [Shayna] I sent her a Facebook message that day.
translation.it: Quel giorno, le mandai un messaggio su Facebook,

translation.en: But the way Facebook works,
translation.it: ma dato che non ero nella sua lista di amici,

translation.en: is because we weren't friends, it went into the secret mailbox
translation.it: ma dato che non ero nella sua lista di amici, andò nella casella di posta in arrivo segreta, che non vide subito.

translation.en: that she didn't see for a few days.
translation.it: andò nella casella di posta in arrivo segreta, che non vide subito.

translation.en: After reading my message,
translation.it: Dopo aver letto il mio messaggio,

translation.en: Netasha immediately got with her mom and gave me a call.
translation.it: Netasha andò subito da sua madre e mi chiamò.

translation.en: And I happened to be on the phone with Elena, so I actually conference-called them in.
translation.it: Per caso, io ero al telefono con Elena, quindi parlammo in audio conferenza.

translation.en: We told them together that we were looking to help Anthony.
translation.it: Gli dicemmo che volevamo aiutare Anthony.

translation.en: They actually called him AJ at first.
translation.it: All'inizio lo chiamarono AJ.

translation.en: Neither of us knew him by that nickname, so we were a little confused at first.
translation.it: Noi non lo conoscevamo con quel soprannome e quindi all'inizio fummo un po' confuse.

translation.en: I started digging for the story,
translation.it: Iniziai a fare domande

translation.en: and immediately they sent me the missing poster.
translation.it: e mi mandarono subito il volantino della sua scomparsa.

translation.en: He was legitimately a missing child, with the poster and everything.
translation.it: Era un autentico bambino scomparso, con il volantino e tutto il resto.

translation.en: That shocked me.
translation.it: Rimasi scioccata.

translation.en: As soon as I heard that,
translation.it: Appena lo sentii,

translation.en: chills go up my spine.
translation.it: mi salirono i brividi lungo la schiena.

translation.en: We start with a major development in the case.
translation.it: C'è stato un grande sviluppo nel caso.

translation.en: Just weeks after Anthony Templet is accused of shooting and killing his father,
translation.it: Anthony Templet è stato accusato d'aver ucciso il padre poche settimane fa.

translation.en: we learned he may have been snatched from his home more than a decade ago.
translation.it: Ora sembrerebbe che sia stato rapito più di dieci anni fa.

translation.en: Part of the puzzle is this flier that actually surfaced from over a decade ago,
translation.it: Parte del puzzle è questo volantino, apparso più di dieci anni fa,

translation.en: claiming Templet was taken from his own home by his own father.
translation.it: che afferma che Templet fu rapito da casa sua dal proprio padre.

translation.en: [Jarrett] There was all these questions in my head about what could have happened.
translation.it: Avevo tutte queste domande in testa su cosa fosse accaduto.

translation.en: Had the kid been caged in his home?
translation.it: Casa sua era una prigione per il ragazzo?

translation.en: Now, I've since learned just how bad it was.
translation.it: Poi sono venuto a sapere quanto fosse grave la situazione.
